Posts.Content: Mar 1, 2012 03:33PM Boeingflyer wrote: I too, have been using cosmetics from 100%pure.com.  Also, I highly recommend biogreenclean.com.  It is a terrific, plant-based cleaner that works well for many things.  I've gotten several of my friends hooked on it.  Also, use Tom's, Burts Bees & Neutrogena Naturals for personal care products.  Love finding new, non-toxic items!
Posts.Title: Better cosmetic & household products? StacyRose stephN
